## Preperation

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

## Summary of Dataset

```{r}
head(penguins, 10)
summary(penguins)
help("penguins")
nrow(penguins)
ncol(penguins)
```

First, we exhibit the first 10 rows of the dataset to get a glance of our dataset. We have 'r nrow(penguins)' rows and 'r ncol(penguins)' columns in total, which means we have 8 variables and 344 samples.
